attributes.action: to nationalise the water companys saving british people £2bn per year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we would like the nationalisation of the water in the uk . we feel that the horrific profits made on what is a basic human need is disgracefull and must stop now . 
profits for 2005 

anglian water £109 million
severn trent £270 million
united utilities £481 million
pennon £111 million

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
